Name: Dance with me
About the game: 《Dance with me》 is a classic single player online VR music game with classic music game playing method and unique dressing system. Put on gorgeous clothes for your favorite role, experience new music fun in the game, and more tracks are waiting for you to unlock! Introduction to core playing methods: The rhythm points in the song will form different types of strike points and fall to the judgment points in front of the player. The player uses the controller to strike the strike points; Accurate hit will get higher judgment, which will affect the final score of the whole song. The songs in the game will be divided into easy, normal and hard. Highlights: With the classic music game playing method and unique dressing system, players will accumulate scores for each song to unlock more clothes.
